body_content.explanation: a document that gives a set of rules for writing and presenting text that is going to be published:
examples: At some presses, the copy editor sends a style sheet to the author before beginning work.
The publisher's style sheet will indicate spelling conventions to be applied.

body_content.explanation: a file that contains rules about how the different parts of a document will appear on screen, and automatically applies them:
examples: The style sheet just controls properties of the HTML elements.
Java Script works with style sheets for two different browsers.
